entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: A family of wizards who are friends with Harry. They have a car that is currently in the Forbidden Forest.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: The father of the Weasleys and a friend of Harry's. He has borrowed cars from the Ministry of Magic before.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's Muggle uncle who is not fond of wizards.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's Muggle aunt who is also not fond of wizards.

relationships.description: The Weasleys are friends with Harry and will be picking him up.
Mr. Weasley has borrowed cars from the Ministry of Magic before.
Harry is a family member of Uncle Vernon's.
Harry is also a family member of Aunt Petunia's.
